name: Crazy Arcade
storyline: There are 11 main characters: Boz, Dao, Diz, Moss, Ike, Melvin, Evie, Plunk, Santa, Lodumani, Shao so player can choose whoever they want to play as. There are 8 players in one game. There are standard mode, which players are divided into team to fight each other. Or free mode, where you can freely choose your team (maybe 1 vs 7 or 4 vs 4). In mission mode, 4 players team up to kill one boss. There are 100 maps for standard and free mode and 7 mission map.
summary: Crazy Arcade or Boom Online has a gameplay similar to Bomberman of Hudson Soft. The aim of each game is carefully planting the bubble bomb and try to kill the opponent when the bomb explode.
